item.title: PINS
item.description: score:118 Chances: Pinterest’s partnership with Amazon and strengthening advertising business make it a standout stock for 2024. The company is steadily investing in technology, such as artificial intelligence, to increase body representation on its platform. The social media industry is growing rapidly, with a projected increase in global users by the end of 2027.
